other_tests.findings: Moderate hiatal hernia with unchanged suture material, wall thickening and mild surrounding fat stranding of the mid sigmoid colon, associated 3.1 x 2.0 x 1.6 cm pericolonic abscess, extensive diverticulosis throughout the entire colon.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Mild improvement in the pericolonic condition noted in repeat CTAP.
